WE LOVE WHAT WE DO

Founded in Austin, TX in 2009 by Will Sherman, a native Austinite, Axis Green Services is a locally-owned, family-run small business.

We are wholly committed to the ideal of serving our customers' energy efficiency and ECAD audit needs in a friendly, professional and informative manner.

Axis Green Services is BPI Certified and City of Austin Registered.

We do not perform any weatherization services or repairs, and are not affiliated with any businesses who do.

ABOUT THE ECAD ORDINANCE

The ECAD Ordinance was originally passed in 2009 by the City of Austin in an attempt to reduce energy consumption, educate citizens about the energy efficiency of their homes, and to collect data for creating programs to help Austinites with energy consumption and electricity bills.

If you are selling your home, you must have an energy audit performed if all three of these statements are true*:

1) Your home is inside Austin city limits.

2) Austin Energy is your energy provider.

3) Your home is over 10 years old.

*For the official documentation from Austin Energy, >> CLICK HERE

Our Services

ECAD AUDIT

Pricing:
$150 (one A/C)
$200 (two A/Cs)
$250 (three A/Cs)
$300 (four A/Cs)

We perform the ECAD (Energy Conservation Audit & Disclosure) as required by the City of Austin, and submit it to Austin Energy (the ECAD is good for 10 years).

Estimate about 40 minutes for the energy auditor to do the ECAD energy audit / inspection.

For more info about the ECAD ordinance
CLICK HERE

EFFICIENCY ASSESSMENT

Pricing:
$250 (one A/C)
$300 (two A/Cs)
$350 (three A/Cs)
$400 (four A/Cs)

Inspecting your home from the outside-in, we'll inspect the thermal barrier, insulation, ducts, windows, air handler/furnace, A/C condenser, fireplace and appliances.

Complete action plan supplied, including links to relevant Austin rebate programs.

Estimate about 75-90 minutes for the energy auditor to perform the energy audit.
